snippet: City leaders asked for more time to put in place changes needed to avoid being replaced by an emergency financial manager as their city inched closer toward bankruptcy.
abstract: Detroit officials appeal Gov Rick Snyder's decision to appoint outside manager, pleading for time to put in place changes needed to avoid a state takeover of city's beleaguered finances.
lead_paragraph: City leaders asked for more time to put in place changes needed to avoid being replaced by an emergency financial manager as their city inched closer toward bankruptcy.

headline.seo: Detroit Seeks More Time to Avoid State Takeover
headline.main: Detroit Asks for More Time to Avoid Takeover
headline.print_headline: Detroit Asks for More Time to Avoid Takeover
